filters.description: An array of filter definition objects.

filter<br />filterFramework.description: Child filter component to use inside the Multi Filter.

filterParams.description: Custom parameters to be passed to the child filter component.

floatingFilterComponent<br />floatingFil.description: Floating filter component to use for the child filter.

floatingFilterComponentParams.description: Custom parameters to be passed to the floating filter component.

display.description: Configures how the filter is shown in the Multi Filter.

title.description: The title to be used when a filter is displayed inside a sub-menu or accordion.

isFilterActive().description: Returns `true` if the filter is currently active, otherwise `false`.

getModel().description: Returns a model representing the current state of the filter, or `null` if the filter is not active.

setModel().description:
Sets the state of the child filters using the supplied models. Providing `null` will de-activate all child filters.

**Note:** if you are [providing values asynchronously](/filter-set-filter-list/#asynchronous-values) to a child [Set Filter](/filter-set/), you need to wait for these changes to be applied before performing any further actions by waiting on the returned grid promise, e.g. `filter.setModel([null, { values: ['a', 'b'] }]).then(function() { gridApi.onFilterChanged(); });`

getChildFilterInstance().description: Returns the child filter instance at the specified index.
